WorkItem.ClosedComment: Apparently the Mana Tide was being added in whether you selected the option or not, this will be fixed in the next build I post.
WorkItem.Description: Nor does it increase the time till OOM.  Using the attached data file, with a fight length of 5 mintues, rawr says I'll go oom at 287 seconds.  After checking "Mana Tide totem every cooldown", It's still telling me I'll go oom at 287 seconds.  If I increase the fight length to 15 minutes, Rawr indicates oom at 697 seconds both with and without the totem selected.
WorkItem.Summary: [RestoSham] Mana Tide totem does not increase mp5
